Class.remarks: See the for details on registering the rubicon.web configuration section.
Class.example:
Setting the resources entry's values in the rubicon.web configuration section.
<rubicon.web xmlns="http://www.rubicon-it.com/commons/web/configuration"> <resources root="res" rootPath="AbsoluteWithApplicationRoot" /> <!-- Other configuration section entries. --> </rubicon.web>

Root.value: A string specifying an absolute path or a path relative to the application root. Defaults to res.
Root.remarks: Leading and trailing slashes are removed.

RootMode.value: A value of the enumeration. Defaults to .
